title: LTJ Bukem - "Producer" Discography - Which font is it?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010231032im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ltj_bukem_font.jpg)

I have seen this font (the one that "producer" is written) long time ago, and fell in love with it... i had tried then to find it... but the closest one i found was a free and with poor quality ( [Astronaut](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010231032/http:/www.1001fonts.com/font_details.html?font_id=267)).

If you know exactly the name of the font that it is used in the cd covers of LTJ Bukem... you will draw a smile in a man's face :o)

Thanx in advance for any info.

Cheers.
author: tyfont

comments.content:
LTJ BUKEM is Novarese's [Stop](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010231032/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=EF.10421.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=74&sampleText=LTJ+BUKEM&sampleSize=60)

I don't know the other font.

Richard

Thanx Richard for your input... hope someone knows the "producer" one...

Nick
